guts.utilities¶

Module: guts.utilities¶

Utility functions.

Authors:
  • Arno Klein, 2012-2013 (arno@mindboggle.info) http://binarybottle.com

Copyright 2013, Mindboggle team (http://mindboggle.info), Apache v2.0 License

Functions¶

mindboggle.guts.utilities.execute(cmd, type='os')¶

Execute command by either subprocess.call or os.system.

Parameters:

cmd : sequence (string also permitted if type==’os’)

command with arguments

type : string

how to execute {os, subprocess}

Examples

>>> from mindboggle.guts.utilities import execute
>>> cmd = ['ls', '-l', '-a', '.']
>>> type = 'subprocess'
>>> execute(cmd, type)
>>> type = 'os'
>>> execute(cmd, type)
>>> cmd = 'ls -l -a .'
>>> execute(cmd)
